attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The local-unique identifier of this callset (referenced as "callset_id").
The identifier ("biosample.id") of the biosample this variant was reported from. This is a shortcut to using the variant -> callset -> biosample chaining.
attributes.name: biosample_id

attributes.example: SNP6 array of cancer sample BRCA-0893
attributes.name: description
attributes.description: A free text description of the callset.

attributes.name: geo_provenance
attributes.description: This geo_class attribute ideally describes the geographic location of where this callset was analysed.

attributes.name: updated
attributes.description: time of the last edit of this record, in ISO8601

name: callset
description: The callset object contains information about an experiment performed on material from a single biosample and is a shared identifier for all variants detected in this experiment, attributed to the referenced biosample.
